speaker.whotheyare: Tamara Roukaerts is head of marketing at Aurasma, working to build an augmented-reality lens via smartphones.
speaker.whylisten: Tamara joined Aurasma at its launch in June 2011 as Head of Marketing, having previously led marketing at venture-backed start-up Light Blue Optics for four years. Prior to that, she earned her high-tech stripes working for the Cambridge-MIT Institute - a $100 million joint venture between the University of Cambridge and the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. Tamara started her career working in advertising for Saatchi & Saatchi and has a Masters degree from Oxford University.
